attributes.background: There is a humanitarian crisis occurring in southern Europe and we cannot ignore it any longer. I believe we are obliged to heed the call of people in extreme need, especially on our doorstep. We have to rise above any small island mentality, and help these desperate people.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106509

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
